input.description:
Example for: 7.0
<adapter-event> <source-adapter>SNMPMonitorAdapter</source-adapter> <event>TrapMessage</event> <data> <trap> <host>172.21.127.10</host> <sysuptime>198988874</sysuptime> <enterprise>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192</enterprise> <generic-trap-type>0</generic-trap-type> <specific-trap-type>0</specific-trap-type> <varbinds> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.2.1.1.3.0</oid> <value>23 days, 0 hours, 44 minutes, 48 seconds.</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.4.1.0</oid> <value>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.2.0.6</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.1.0</oid> <value></value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.2.0</oid> <value>[_Modified Device 1760-01=True]</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.3.0</oid> <value>Compliancy violation notification from bcan-test-01</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.4.0</oid> <value>Persius1</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.6.0</oid> <value>https://bcan-test-01.bmc.com</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.5.0</oid> <value>Persius1 failed..</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.7.0</oid> <value></value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.8.0</oid> <value>AS0050560C63F2L0K0RAX1htAQc5YA</value> </varbind> </varbinds> </trap> </data> </adapter-event>

<adapter-event> <source-adapter>SNMPMonitorAdapter</source-adapter> <event>TrapMessage</event> <data> <trap> <host>172.21.127.10</host> <sysuptime>198988874</sysuptime> <enterprise>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192</enterprise> <generic-trap-type>0</generic-trap-type> <specific-trap-type>0</specific-trap-type> <varbinds> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.2.1.1.3.0</oid> <value>23 days, 0 hours, 44 minutes, 48 seconds.</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.4.1.0</oid> <value>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.2.0.6</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.1.0</oid> <value></value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.2.0</oid> <value>[_Modified Device 1760-01=True]</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.3.0</oid> <value>Compliancy violation notification from bcan-test-01</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.4.0</oid> <value>ATL-cisco1720-04</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.6.0</oid> <value>https://bcan-test-01.bmc.com</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.5.0</oid> <value>Persius1 failed..</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.7.0</oid> <value></value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.8.0</oid> <value>AG005056B51824Z4EZSQElKeAwo3sB</value> </varbind> </varbinds> </trap> </data> </adapter-event>
<adapter-event> <source-adapter>SNMPMonitorAdapter</source-adapter> <event>TrapMessage</event> <data> <trap> <host>172.22.174.247</host> <sysuptime>623415</sysuptime> <enterprise>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192</enterprise> <generic-trap-type>0</generic-trap-type> <specific-trap-type>0</specific-trap-type> <varbinds> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.2.1.1.3.0</oid> <value>1 hours, 43 minutes, 54 seconds.</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.4.1.0</oid> <value>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.2.0.6</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.1.0</oid> <value></value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.2.0</oid> <value>[Compliancy Violation Detected Now=True; (! Compliancy Violation Past); Compliancy Violation Past=False]</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.3.0</oid> <value>Compliance Violation Detected</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.4.0</oid> <value>ATL-cisco1720-04</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.6.0</oid> <value>https://bcan-qa-03:443</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.5.0</oid> <value>Compliancy rule EdgeRouter Security.SNMP ACL 40 violated in Running trail.</value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.7.0</oid> <value></value> </varbind> <varbind> <oid>.1.3.6.1.4.1.17192.1.1.8.0</oid> <value>AG005056B51824Z4EZSQElKeAwo3sB</value> </varbind> </varbinds> </trap> </data> </adapter-event>

output.description:
String Value - Incident Number
Example:
INC000000001234

String Value - Change ID
Example:
CRQ000000000878

String Value - Incident ID
Example:
TAS00000000778

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: 0-success,1-failure
String Value â€“ A verbose message indicating the success or failure of the process

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("An unknown notification type was received for the following device: ", .)
//notification-type/text() ='Compliancy Violation Found' or //notification-type/text() = 'All Compliancy Violations Cleared'

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <Configuration-Item> <name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[device]</xsl:text> </name> <instance-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[device instance id]</xsl:text> </instance-id> </Configuration-Item> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Incident ${incident number} successfully created for device: ", .)

call-process.process-name: :Closed_Loop-SA-Change_Management:Utilities:Update Task with URL and Job ID

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Task update successful for Task ID: ", .)
concat("Relationships created successfully for Task ID: ", .)
concat("Relationship creation failed for the following Task ID: ", .)
concat("Update failed with the following error message: ${task update message} for Task ID ", .)
concat("Server URL already existed for Task ID: ", .)
concat("Unable to retrieve data from the following Task ID: ", .)

call-process.process-name: :Closed_Loop-SA-Change_Management:Utilities:Update Task with URL and Job ID

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Task update successful for Task ID: ", .)
concat("Relationships created successfully for Task ID: ", .)
concat("Relationship creation failed for the following Task ID: ", .)
concat("Update failed with the following error message: ${task update message} for Task ID ", .)
concat("Unable to reteive task data for the following Change ID: ", .)
concat("Incident creation failed for the following device: ", .)
concat("Incident creation successfull for the following device: ", .)
concat("Incident creation failed for the following device: ", .)

documentation.description: This workflow on the receipt of an SNMP trap, will create an Incident, and or Change depending upon the content of the SNMP trap.
